alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:35PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. Heavy snow may impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds may continue through around 5 AM, with wind gusts to 60 mph possible. This may cause very low visibility in areas of wind-driven heavy snowfall and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
